data.title: Panch Kedar
data.qoute: ...Explore Haridwar and Kedarnath and Tungnath and Madhmaheshwar and Rudranath and Kalpeshwar and Rishikesh

overview.title: Panch Kedar (…Feel the Inner Spiritual beauty):
overview.subtitle: It’s the time in Kurushetra war (Mahabharat) between Kauravas and Pandavas. Pandavas killed all their kith and kinn (Kaurava) in the war after that, they felt sinner for killed own relatives. Then Pandavas went to Lord Shiva for remission form sin, but Lord Shiva did not want to see unwillingly and he ran to hidden from Pandavas in Garhwal Himalayan range of Uttarakhand, on the way Lord shiva was spotted by Pandavas in the area of Kedarnath valley. Then Lord Shiva changed his form in the form of buffalo and try to diving in marsh land but Pandavas caught lord Shiva when trying to go underground, hump of buffalo leaving behind on the surface then eventually Lord Shiva remission to Pandavas and permiss him to worship his hump in the form of buffalo at here and it is strongly believed that Pandavas buit Kedarnath temple in just one night to worship Lord Shiva in the form of hump of buffalo at Kedarnath. The other parts of buffalo apperars in different area of Kedarnath valley. arms appear in Tungnath, face apear in Rudranath, navel part of body(middle) appere in Madmaheshwar valley and hair appear and worshiped at Kalpeshwar temple.

data.route: Delhi – Haridwar – Kedarnath – Tungnath – Madhmaheshwar – Rudranath – Kalpeshwar – Rishikesh – Delhi
data.nightStay: Haridwar (2 Nights), Guptkashi (2 Nights), Kedarnath (1 Night), Gaundhar (2 Nights), Madmaheshwar (1 Night), Chopta (2 Nights), Panargupha (1 Night), Rudranath (1 Night), Dumuk (1 Night), Kalpeshwar (1 Night), Rudraprayag (1 Night)

description.title: Day 1 Pickup from Delhi Railway Station/Airport (215 Kms : 6Hrs. Travelling to Haridwar)

subtitles.activities: Start Yatra from Delhi to Haridwar.
Enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel, with Welcome Drink(Non Alcoholic).
In evening you can visit world famous Ganga Aarti at Har ki Pauri.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Haridwar.

description.title: Day 2 Haridwar to Guptkashi (220 Kms : 7-8Hrs. Travelling to Guptkashi)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Check Out from Hotel, Depart for Haridwar.
Leave very early in the morning for almost day long drive to Guptkashi
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Guptkashi.

description.title: Day 3 Guptkashi to Kedarnath (35 Kms Drive and 21 Kms by foot)

place.title: Kedarnath
place.subtitle: 35 Kms Drive and 21 Kms by foot

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, start Yatra for 1st Kedar Kedarnath.

The present temple built in 8th Century A.D. by Adi Guru Shankaracharya lies adjacent to the site of an ancient temple built by Pandavas. The temple has a conical lingam - the main idol, a statue of Nandi - the celestial bull, a 'Garba Grah' for worship and a man dap for assemblies of pilgrims and visitors. The temple is more than 1000 years old.

Bhaironath Temple :-About half a kilometer away from Kedarnathji, a small temple is dedicated to Bhaironath. It is worshipped on the opening and closing day of Sri Kedarnath Shrine. Ii is believed that when Kedarnathji temple is closed. Bhaironathji protects this land from evil.
Dinner at Hotel & Overnight Stay at Kedarnath.

description.title: Day 4 Kedarnath to Guptkashi (21 Kms by foot and 35 Kms Drive)

place.title: Guptkashi
place.subtitle: 21 Kms by foot and 35 Kms Drive

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, move for Guptkashi.
Full day free to explore the Guptkashi.
Dinner at Hotel & Overnight Stay at Guptkashi.

description.title: Day 5 Guptkashi to Gaundhar (17 Kms : 8-9Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Check Out from Hotel, Start trekking for Gaundhar.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 6 Gaundhar to Madmaheshwar (17 Kms : 7-8Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Madhmaheshwar.
Start Yatra for 2nd Kedar Madhmaheshwar.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 7 Madmaheshwar to Gaundhar (17 Kms : 7-8Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Gaundhar.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 8 Gaundhar to Chopta (25 Kms Drive and 17 Kms : 7-8Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Chopta.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Chopta.

description.title: Day 9 Chopta to Tungnath to Chopta (3.5 Kms : 1-2Hrs. one way trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Tungnath.
Start Yatra for 3rd Kedar Tungnath.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Chopta.

description.title: Day 10 Chopta to Panargupha (30 Kms Drive and 10 Kms : 5-6Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Panargupha.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 11 Panargupha to Rudranath (12 Kms : 6-7Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Rudranath.
Start Yatra for 4th Kedar Rudranath.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 12 Rudranath to Dumuk (18 Kms : 8-9Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Dumuk.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 13 Dumuk to Kalpeshwar (14 Kms : 7-8Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Start trekking for Kalpeshwar.
Start Yatra for 5th Kedar Kalpeshwar.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Camp.

description.title: Day 14 Kalpeshwar to Rudraprayag (105 Kms Drive and 9 Kms : 2-3Hrs. trekking)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, Move for Rudrapryag.
Start trek to Helang and then drive to Rudraprayag.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Rudrapryag.

description.title: Day 15 Rudrapryag to Haridwar (160 Kms : 6-7Hrs. Travelling to Haridwar)

subtitles.activities: After breakfast, move for Haridwar.
On the way you can visit Rishikesh such as Prabhat Niketan, Ram Jhoola, Laxman Jhoola.
Dinner & Overnight Stay at Haridwar.

description.title: Day 16 Check Out from Haridwar (220 Kms : 6-7Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Breakfast at Hotel.
Reaching at Railway Station/Airport by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: All extras (F & B and any other services) availed by the customer will be on direct payment basis.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
In case of odd number groups, the extra person shall be accommodated in the same room with an extra bed /mattress.
The above rates are applicable to the Indian Nationals only.
Any Meals, services not utilized, partly utilized are non-refundable.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)

importantInfo.title: Mode of Payment:
subtitles: Kindly release 25% Payment for the Blocking.
Kindly release total 50% Payment before 30 days of arrival.
Kindly release total 100% Payment before 7 days of arrival.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy:
subtitles: 10% of the Total Package Cost is Non-Refundable.
25% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation less than 30 days before arrival.
35% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation between 15 to 7 days before arrival.
50% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation between 7 to 2 days before arrival.
100% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation before 48 Hrs. before arrival.
Altering the confirmed plan Not possible.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Experience Includes:
subtitles: Accommodation at all the places mention in the itinerary.
Meal Plan: MAPAI (Bed with Breakfast and Dinner) based on fixed meals, served in the restaurant.
Transportation around the tour (As mentioned above).
All sightseeing and excursion as per the Itinerary.
All Toll Tax, Parking Includes.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Package Excludes:
subtitles: Air Fare / Train Fare.
Any meals other than those specified in ‘Experience Includes’.
Expenses of personal nature such as tips, telephone calls, laundry etc.
Entrance fees during sightseeing.
Destination Guide.
Any item of personal nature like Telephone, Tips, Donations at Temples, Extended Stay or Travelling due to any reason.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: High lights:
subtitles: No Night Travel (After 7:00 pm as per Government Rules).
Sumptuous, Hygienic and pure vegetarian food as per regional taste and palate.
Neat & clean hotels and Camp with quality service

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Weather Condition:
subtitles: Expenses incurred due to bad weather condition, Road Closes, Landslides are out of control will be charge extra as per actual.
